= Introduction =

How to install the project.


= Details =

  # Copy the contents into a directory name "cfcgenerator" under your web root _NOTE: If you need to place it elsewhere, a mapping should work,  but you will need to edit your [webroot]\web-inf\flex\services-config.xml and set <use-mappings>true</use-mappings>_
  # That's it!

_NOTE: When loading a new version it may sometimes be necessary to append ?reload=true to the generator URL to refresh items cached in the application scope._
